text: Aldis Kušķis (born 6 October 1965 in Riga, Latvia) is a Latvian politician. From 2004 till 2009 he was Member of the European Parliament for the New Era Party; part of the European People's Party. == References == ==External links== *http://www.kuskis.lv/ - personal webpage Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Riga Category:New Era Party politicians Category:Deputies of the 8th Saeima Category:New Era Party MEPs Category:MEPs for Latvia 2004–2009
title: Aldis Kušķis
